Publications

Juels, A., and R. Pappu. 2003. Squealing Euros: Privacy Protection in RFID-Enabled Banknotes. Proceedings of the Financial Cryptography ’03 conference.

Gandhi, P., S. S. Rao, and R. Pappu. 1997. Wavelets for Waveform Coding of Digital Symbols. IEEE Transactions on Signal Processing.

Gandhi, P., S. S. Rao, and R. Pappu. 1994. Wavelets for Baseband Coding of Waveforms.
